oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Synthesis and photochemical reaction of tricyclo[7.2.2.0(2,8)] tridecanes: a novel entry to the BCD carbon framework of phorbol
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: SINGH, V
SAMANTA, B
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: diels-alder reactions
tigliane ring-system
daphnane diterpenoids
imda approach
periodate oxidation
tumor promoters
photoreaction
triquinanes
generation
aromatics
cycloaddition
decarbonylation
photochemistry
diels-alder reaction
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Synthesis of 10,10-dimethyltricyclo[7.2.2.0(2,8)] tridec-12-ene-3,11-dione 5 via cycloaddition of a cyclohexa-2,4-dienone with cycloheptadiene and its photoreaction to tricyclic compound 3 containing BCD ring system of phorbol is presented.
